Caption: Don't you think the 50s would've been even cooler with you in it? Welcome to my new website!
A new journey begins today! Start recording our first EP means a lot more than what it seems...
Every obstacle that I have ever had to go through comes down to the moment when you provide voice to the ones who have never been heard before…

CaptionTitle: Can You Believe in Peace Again?
Caption: Dreams were swept away forever…
